title: Arts, A/V Technology, and Communications: Career Cluster Knowledge and Skill Statements with Suggested Performance Indicators
subject: CTE

document.title: ARTS, INFORMATION, AND COMMUNICATIONS Statewide Program of Study Framework: Arts, A/V Technology, and Communications Career Cluster
